VoiceList.Entry: Cloud “A model of Midgar…a city born from the earth's Mako.”
“Some parts are missing…” Insert the Midgar parts Leave it alone
Cloud “Midgar…a city born from the earth's Mako. A model of the city…”
“When construction of Sector 6 finishes,Shinra's plan will be complete.”
“That must be why he took Aeris…”
